stf 2.0.0.9500
  • Reference
  • Articles

    Reference

    All functions

    classify_respondent()

    Classify respondents in Complaints (Reclamacao por descumprimento)

    download_stf_collection()

    Downloads Brazilian Supreme Courts decisions' collection

    download_stf_dockets()

    Downloads Brazilian Supreme Court lawsuits based on the proceding class and the docket number.

    download_stf_pdf()

    Downloads pdf text documents based on docket sheet

    download_stf_rtf()

    Downloads rtf documents based on doc_url column from docket sheet data.

    get_stf_collection()

    Wraper around functions download_stf_collection and read_stf_collection.

    get_stf_mono_metadata()

    Gets all the metadata from Brazilian Supreme Court monocratic decisions

    get_stf_opinion()

    Gets the pdfs with the panel's opinion text according to the metadata obtained by the stf_precedent_metadata function.

    get_stf_precedent_metadata()

    Returns metadada from Brazilian Supreme Court precedents

    get_stf_precedent_sheet()

    Gets STF precedent sheet

    get_stf_rtf()

    Gets rtf texts from url connection

    get_stf_thesaurus()

    Gets STF thesaurus

    join_stf_text()

    Joins pdf and rtf texts to docket sheet

    modelo

    modelo

    read_stf_collection()

    Read STF collection

    read_stf_details()

    Reads decision details

    read_stf_docket_sheet()

    Reads Brazilian Supreme Court decision's docket sheet.

    read_stf_information() stf_read_information()

    Reads data from information tab.

    stf

    stf package

    stf_authenticate()

    Authenticate to use STF API

    stf_classify_appeal()

    classifies appeals from stf based on decision summary

    stf_download_cjsg()

    Download STF decisions by free search

    stf_download_details()

    Download detailed information based on incidente number

    stf_download_details2()

    Download details based on classe and docket number

    stf_download_document_table()

    Download procedural documents (peças) list

    stf_download_documents()

    Downloads documents from table created with stf_read_document_table

    stf_download_information()

    Download html with information based on incidente

    stf_download_lawsuit()

    Downloads lawsuit

    stf_download_parties()

    Download html with parties based on incidente

    stf_download_sheet()

    Download html with docket follow-up sheet based on incidente

    stf_extract_date()

    Extract dates from opinions' text

    stf_get_communication()

    Gets daily coummunication from STF about one's lawsuit

    stf_read_cjsg()

    Read precedentes downloaded with stf_download_cjsg

    stf_read_document_table()

    Read procedutural document list table donwloaded with stf_download_document_table

    stf_read_parties()

    Reads docket parties names.

    stf_read_pdf()

    Reads pdf files

    stf_read_rtf()

    Reads rtf files

    view_stf_help()

    Displays STF's help page on browser.

    view_stf_thesaurus()

    Displays STF's thesaurus.
